turkish_example_sentence: Onlar hastanede olmamışlarsa, doktor onları muayene edemezdi.
english_example_sentence: If they had not been at the hospital, the doctor could not have examined them.
russian_example_sentence: Если бы они не были в больнице, врач не смог бы их осмотреть.
